traits.Amphibious: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.Multiattack: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
actions.Claw: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Poison Breath (Recharge 5xe2x80x936): The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
